args.subject: Summary of the client meeting
args.body:
Dear John Mitchell, 

Here is a summary of our recent meeting:

- Discussed the client’s requirements for the new project.
- Agreed on the project timeline and key milestones.
- Reviewed the initial design concepts and gathered client feedback.

Action Items:
- Emma will update the project plan based on your feedback.
- David will coordinate with the development team to start the initial phase.
- The next meeting is scheduled for June 1, 2024.

Best regards, 
Emma Johnson
